Returns: the @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#Tile_E@ to be used for this tile coordinate. If you do not wish to provide a tile for this tile coordinate, return @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#TileProvider#NO_TILE_E@. If the tile could not be found at this point in time, return null and further requests might be made with an exponential backoff.
Parameters: The x coordinate of the tile. This will be in the range [0, 2zoom - 1] inclusive.
The y coordinate of the tile. This will be in the range [0, 2zoom - 1] inclusive.
The zoom level of the tile. This will be in the range [ @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#GoogleMap#getMinZoomLevel_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#GoogleMap#getMaxZoomLevel_E@] inclusive.
getTile(int, int, int).Description: Returns the tile to be used for this tile coordinate.
getTile(int, int, int).FullName: public final Tile getTile (int x, int y, int zoom)

Returns: URL a @B_java#net#URL_E@ that points to the image to be used for this tile. If you do not wish to provide an image for this tile coordinate, return null.
Parameters: The x coordinate of the tile. This will be in the range [0, 2zoom - 1] inclusive.
The y coordinate of the tile. This will be in the range [0, 2zoom - 1] inclusive.
The zoom level of the tile. This will be in the range [ @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#GoogleMap#getMinZoomLevel_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#GoogleMap#getMaxZoomLevel_E@] inclusive.
getTileUrl(int, int, int).Description: Returns a @B_java#net#URL_E@ that points to the image to be used for this tile. If no image is found on the initial request, further requests will be made with an exponential backoff. If you do not wish to provide an image for this tile coordinate, return null.
getTileUrl(int, int, int).FullName: public abstract URL getTileUrl (int x, int y, int zoom)

Parameters: width of the images used for tiles
height of the images used for tiles

ClassDesc: A partial implementation of @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#TileProvider_E@ that only requires a URL that points to an image to be provided. Note that this class requires that all the images have the same dimensions.
